Name: Name
Definition: Column headers from each csv file in the dataset.

Name: d50_mm_yolo
Definition: Median particle size determined by the YOLO model

Name: d50_mm_nexss
Definition: Median particle size determined by the NEXSS model

Name: d50_mm_abeshu
Definition: Median particle size determined by the Abeshu model

Name: d50_mm_log2
Definition: log2-transformed d50 value from Abeshu et al. (2022)'s Figure 4

Name: count_raw
Definition: Count value from histogram bar in Abeshu et al. (2022)'s Figure 4

Name: count
Definition: count_raw normalized by dividing by 50 to match scales

Name: name
Definition: Filenames of images modeled with YOLO

Name: YOLO
Definition: Image category: modeling training or prediction?

Name: long axis (m)
Definition: d50 based on longest particle axis

Name: area covered (%)
Definition: Area of image covered by identified particles

Name: D50_mm_guta
Definition: d50 es4timate based on Abeshu et al. 2022
